alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Maricopa Counties through 345 PM MST... At 259 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Punkin Center and Sunflower. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Round Valley, Sycamore Creek, Sunflower, Ballantine Trailhead, Punkin Center and Tonto Basin. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 211 and 229. AZ Route 188 between mile markers 254 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin
